chapters.title: Chapter 13: An Offer and a Departure
chapters.info: Covarla Baldene, p. 220—Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah; one of those who attempted to capture Rand. She was later kept as an apprentice to the Wise Ones, and then commanded the eleven sisters that escaped to Dorlan where the Younglings were. She was displaced from her room with Lusonia Cole when Tarna and Katerine arrived in Tar Valon.
